work.summary: Building and adding to open source software in an incubator collective of self-taught developers supported by senior engineers. I build full stack web apps in JavaScript, specializing in Node, Express and React.
highlights: LOS: Learning Operating System: Active open source software used by 80 people daily, React and Redux front, RethinkDB and GraphQL back
Mirror: Interview preparation and quiz application. React front, Postgres with Knex back

volunteer.summary: Event Coordinator and Manager at Oakland's non-profit video game museum, offering free coding and design classes to the public.
highlights: Successful $50k kickstarter campaign amongst other fundraisers
Hosting hackathons, field trips, and educational events.
